questions.question: What is the predominant color of the knitted upper material of the sneaker?

Considering the sole's appearance, what would you describe its texture as?
What is the material of the midsole's outer section, considering its appearance?
Observing the lacing system, how would you classify its configuration?

Considering the visible construction, is the shoe's upper seamlessly knitted or composed of separate pieces?
What is the visible pattern of the knitted upper material, ignoring the stripes?

What is the most apparent texture of the main body of the shoe?
